objects.name: Analytic 1554
objects.description: ESXi hypervisor environmental validation behavioral chain: (1) Virtual machine inventory and configuration enumeration through vim-cmd and esxcli commands, (2) Host hardware and network configuration discovery for hypervisor environment validation, (3) Datastore and storage configuration reconnaissance, (4) vCenter connectivity and cluster membership validation, (5) Selective malware deployment based on virtualization infrastructure characteristics and target VM validation
